snippet: Tampa Bay scored three runs in the eighth to beat Seattle and increase their lead in the A.L. wild-card race.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Tampa Bay Rays beat Seattle Mariners, 4-1; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Tampa Bay scored three runs in the eighth to beat Seattle and increase their lead in the A.L. wild-card race.

headline.main: With Rally, Rays Build Wild-Card Advantage
headline.print_headline: With Rally, Rays Build Wild-Card Advantage
